text: Thank you for your assistance, can you also help me with my business account before we end the call?
Yes, I do want to end the call now but before that, could you please confirm if this is the right place to ask about my business account and thank you for your time.

I just wanted to affirm that I'm speaking to the right person for business account-related queries and also thank you for assisting me so far, before I end the call could you help me with one last thing?
Thank you for your help, I also wanted to ask about the status of my account and if there is any chance of a refund?
I just wanted to affirm that I received my order, and also inquire about my account balance and whether I am eligible for a refund?
Can you please provide me with an update on my refund request, and also let me know if there are any issues with my account that need to be resolved? Thank you!
Can you please confirm if the delivery will arrive before 6 pm and suggest a less expensive alternative?
Yes, I confirm that this is a new account. How can I make a payment deposit?
I affirm that I did not authorize the overdraft fee charged to my account, and I want it to be refunded.
I want to speak to a human about a withdrawal but I want to deny a card transaction.
I need to ask about a withdrawal from my account and also inquire about a replacement card, is that possible to hand off to someone who can help me with both?
Can you change the card information and deny the charge on my account?
How long does it take to change the address and deny any charges on my card?
I want to know how long it will take to receive my new credit card and if I can change the billing address.
Can I deny a standing order before activating it?
I want to make sure I set up a standing order correctly, can you lower the amount before applying it?
Before getting into the details of the standing order, can you tell me if there's anything I can do to make it less complicated?
Why is the feature not working on my business account? Can you deny that it's a technical problem?
The website is wrong, not showing the correct information. Why is this happening and can you fix it for my business account?
I don't think I should be charged for this. Can you deny this transaction and explain why it happened on my business account? Is there something not working correctly?
I'm sorry, but we have limits on how much you can withdraw with your pin number on a cheque.
Can I increase my withdrawal limits, or do I need to go through the process of updating my pin number and requesting new cheques?
I have a question about my cheque account, specifically about the limits on transfers and if I need to provide my pin number for authorization.
I acknowledge that you are asking about withdrawals. At this time, I don't know if they are less or lower than before. Would you like me to look up more information?

Can you clarify if your question about withdrawals is related to something less, lower, or decreasing? I don't know the answer, but I can definitely look it up for you and acknowledge your request for information.
Excuse me, I don't know if contactless payment requires a PIN. Can you acknowledge if it's necessary to enter my PIN for a contactless transaction?
I acknowledge that you mentioned contactless payment, but can you clarify if it still works if my card has a PIN?

I want to know if my card has a contactless payment feature but I don't know if I should look for a symbol or ask for a new card. Can you assist me with both the contactless feature and PIN related questions?
I don't know, but can you please hand me off to a human so I can request some information and end the call permanently?
Before we end our call, can I please request some information and speak to a human for a better understanding of this situation?
I'm not sure what to do, can you hand me off to someone who can help me request some information and bring an end to this call?
I'm not sure how much money is left on my card, can you check the balance?
How much does it cost to replace a lost card? Is there an existing fee for it?
I'm not sure how much I can borrow for a loan, can you help me understand the limits?
I don't know if I qualify for a loan and if there are any limits on how much I can borrow, can you assist me with this?
I'm not sure if I should open a new savings account or use my debit card for savings, do you know which is better?
Can you tell me if I can use my debit card for savings and earn some interest? I've never heard about it before.
Hi there! Can you repeat that appointment time for me, please? I just want to acknowledge that I have it correct.
Hey, I'd like to set up an appointment, but first, could you greet me and tell me what availability you have? And if you don't mind, could you repeat those dates one more time?
Excuse me, can I acknowledge that I'm in the right place for my appointment? Also, I have a question about rescheduling. Could you repeat the cancellation policy for me?
Hello, I think my credit card may have been lost or stolen, can you help me with that?
Excuse me, I lost my ID card and I need to report it, can you assist me with that?
Can you please acknowledge that I want to transfer money and end the call after helping me set up online banking?
I need your help to make a deposit, activate a new account, and transfer funds - can you kindly acknowledge that and guide me through the process before we end the call?

Hey, I would like to open a new account, apply for a loan, and set up a direct deposit. Can you please acknowledge my request and assist me? Also, before we end the call, could you answer my question about a recent transfer to my account?
I appreciate you explaining the fees and interests, but can you also tell me why these apply to my account?
Thank you for acknowledging my request. Can you also provide me with the international shipping rates and my pin number for checkout?
I want to thank you for helping me with my account last week. As an international customer, can you confirm if I need a unique pin number to access my account?
Acknowledge my concern about the recent international news. Can you also reset my pin number for my account?
I understand that you have questions about cheque fees and interests. Can you please clarify why you need this information?
Could you please acknowledge if you have received your cheque ? Also, can you explain why you needed it and if there were any fees or interests associated with it?
I'm sorry, I cannot acknowledge that request as it is not related to cheque fees or interests . Can you explain why you need this information?
Can you acknowledge if the debit has increased higher after a specific time?
When is the debit due and can you acknowledge if there is a fee for paying more higher after the due date?
Can you acknowledge if there are any late fees related to debit payments and when they are due? Also, is there a possibility of more interest charges after a certain time?
I want to know the interest rate on the savings account and when can I make a withdrawal?
Can you acknowledge the transfer I just made and confirm the savings account balance and when I can schedule a withdrawal?
After reviewing my account, can you acknowledge that an overdraft occurred, and confirm when the refund will be processed?
My card was lost and I need to acknowledge that I made a withdrawal before it went missing.
I need to report a lost or stolen card and inquire about the process for withdrawing funds.
Can you confirm that my recent withdrawal was successful and also answer a question about my credit card statement?
Can you acknowledge my request for a direct debit and help me understand how to set it up in a way that has less fees and lower payments?
I need to make sure my monthly debit payments for my utility bill are decreasing and I want to acknowledge any changes in the payment schedule.
Could you help me understand how a direct debit works and if I can use it to make a debit payment for my credit card bill? Also, can you acknowledge my concern about any potential late fees?
Could you please confirm the amount of my recent withdrawal and also let me know if I need to set up standing order for any future payments?
I need to transfer some money to my friend's account, can you help me with that and also book an appointment for me with the customer service representative?
Hey there! Do you want me to help you with canceling your order or setting limits on your account before we end the call?
Goodbye! Was there anything else you needed assistance with, such as canceling or setting limits on your subscription?
Hi, before you leave, do you need help canceling a reservation or setting limits on your account?
Hi there! I would like to cancel my savings account and speak to a human representative, please.

Hey, is it just me or does this seem to be performing less efficiently than before? Can you look into why it might be lower than expected?
Hello, can you explain why my cheque has not been cashed and whether there are any international issues affecting the process?

Hey, how long will my credit card application take to be approved and is it possible to get a contactless card?

Good morning! Can you help me open a new savings account and also let me know the fees and interests associated with it?
Hey! I want to inquire about an existing savings account and its current balance along with the fees and interests associated with it.
Thanks for explaining the loan options, but could you also clarify the debit requirements and confirm if I can end the call now?
Before we end the call, could you check if there's any information about loan repayment plans and how they are linked to my debit card?

I accidentally froze my account and need to cancel that request. Also, can you help me end the call?

Can you help me with a credit application, and while we're at it, could you also explain how long it takes to process a withdrawal and how to end the call when we're done?
